amendatorysection.catchline: Emergency measures; exemption; issued by Governor.
amendatorysection.para: Any person, association, partnership, limited liability company, or corporation may appeal to the Governor requesting a partial or complete exemption from the emergency measures ordered pursuant to sections 84-162 to 84-167. Any such exemption issued by the Governor shall be in writing and shall clearly identify those persons exempted, the scope of such exemption, and the reasons for granting such exemptions.
